item.title: Goldman, Investec See Room for Three S. Africa Rate Cuts in 2025
item.description: South Africa’s tame inflation has created room for the central bank to cut interest rates at each of its three remaining meetings this year, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc. and Investec Bank Ltd

item.title: Carlyle Hires Goldman Executive for Credit Business
item.description: Carlyle Group Inc. hired a Goldman Sachs Group Inc. executive to lead its direct lending arm as the money manager works to grow its private credit business.

item.title: Carlyle Hires Goldman Executive for Credit Business
item.description: Carlyle Group Inc. hired a Goldman Sachs Group Inc. executive to lead its direct lending arm as the money manager works to grow its private credit business.

item.title: Expect Three Fed Cuts This Year, Goldman's Dibo Says
item.description: Goldman Sachs’ Matheus Dibo says the US labor market is showing “signs of softness.” Speaking on Bloomberg Television, Dibo adds Goldman Sachs’ base case sees the Fed cut rates “three times this year.

item.title: Expect Three Fed Cuts This Year, Goldman's Dibo Says
item.description: Goldman Sachs’ Matheus Dibo says the US labor market is showing “signs of softness.” Speaking on Bloomberg Television, Dibo adds Goldman Sachs’ base case sees the Fed cut rates “three times this year.

item.title: Nvidia Supplier SK Hynix Dips as Goldman Sees Competition Rising
item.description: SK Hynix Inc. shares declined Thursday after Goldman Sachs Group Inc. downgraded the Korean chipmaker for the first time in over three years, on expectations it may suffer as competitors make advances

item.title: Nvidia Supplier SK Hynix Dips as Goldman Sees Competition Rising
item.description: SK Hynix Inc. shares declined Thursday after Goldman Sachs Group Inc. downgraded the Korean chipmaker for the first time in over three years, on expectations it may suffer as competitors make advances

item.title: Goldman Sachs Remains Optimistic on AI Theme in Asia
item.description: Timothy Moe of Goldman Sachs says the firm remains “optimistic on the AI theme in Asia.” He discusses his views on the region’s technology sector on Bloomberg Television. (Source: Bloomberg)

item.title: US Market Still Looks ‘Solid’: Goldman’s Oppenheimer
item.description: Peter Oppenheimer, chief global equity strategist at Goldman Sachs, offers his view of the US equity market and sees a “growing opportunity set to diversify into other markets” with cheaper valuations
